title: Metastore linkage
test_description: Validate Metastore linkage with Azure AD integration
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const metastoreStep = stepResults.get_metastore; const expected_result = 'AD Group Sync: 100% match'; let actual_result = 'Metastore ID: Not found'; if (metastoreStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from API', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-102-1', title: 'Metastore linkage', expected_result, actual_result }; } const apiOutput = metastoreStep.data; let metastoreValue = null; if (apiOutput.results && apiOutput.results.data && apiOutput.results.data.length > 0) { metastoreValue = apiOutput.results.data[0][0]; } else if (apiOutput.result && apiOutput.result.data_array && apiOutput.result.data_array.length > 0 && apiOutput.result.data_array[0].length > 0) { metastoreValue = apiOutput.result.data_array[0][0]; } else if (apiOutput.manifest && apiOutput.manifest.results && apiOutput.manifest.results.length > 0 && 'active_metastore' in apiOutput.manifest.results[0]) { metastoreValue = apiOutput.manifest.results[0].active_metastore; } if (metastoreValue) { actual_result = 'Metastore ID: ' + metastoreValue; return { status: 'pass', message: 'Metastore found and linked: ' + metastoreValue, code: 'METASTORE_LINKED', test_id: 'IQ-102-1', title: 'Metastore linkage', expected_result, actual_result }; } else { return { status: 'fail', message: 'SQL query for metastore returned data but could not extract metastore value', code: 'NO_METASTORES', test_id: 'IQ-102-1', title: 'Metastore linkage', expected_result, actual_result }; } }
